name: Islanders (clip), 2020
description: This work is a performance on a 3D scan made in the Rijksmuseum, Amsterdam. “Facial casts of Nias islanders JP Kleiweg de Zwaan 1910”, an installation of early 20th century life casts. 47 seconds, 1280x720. A 7 minute version of this video exists: contact info@bitforms.art
